name: R5-Measure-R4B-Measure
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Measure into FHIR R4B

target.comment: R5 `Measure` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure`

element.display: When the measure was approved by publisher

target.display: When the measure was approved by publisher
target.comment: R5 `Measure.approvalDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.approvalDate`
R5 `Measure.author` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.author`
R5 `Measure.clinicalRecommendationStatement` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.clinicalRecommendationStatement`
R5 `Measure.compositeScoring` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.compositeScoring`
R5 `Measure.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.contact`
R5 `Measure.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.contained`
R5 `Measure.copyright` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.copyright`
R5 `Measure.date` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the measure

target.display: Natural language description of the measure
target.comment: R5 `Measure.description` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.description`

element.display: Disclaimer for use of the measure or its referenced content

target.display: Disclaimer for use of the measure or its referenced content
target.comment: R5 `Measure.disclaimer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.disclaimer`
R5 `Measure.editor` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.editor`

element.display: When the measure is expected to be used

target.display: When the measure is expected to be used
target.comment: R5 `Measure.effectivePeriod` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.effectivePeriod`
R5 `Measure.endorser` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.endorser`

element.display: For testing purposes, not real usage

target.display: For testing purposes, not real usage
target.comment: R5 `Measure.experimental` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.experimental`

R5 `Measure.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `Measure.group` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.group`
R5 `Measure.group.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.group.code`

R5 `Measure.group.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.group.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B description

R5 `Measure.group.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.group.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `Measure.group.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.group.id`

element.display: Logic used by the measure group
Unique id for group in measure
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Measure.group.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.group.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `Measure.group.population` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.group.population`

element.display: Aggregation method for a measure score (e.g. sum, average, median, minimum, maximum, count)
initial-population | numerator | numerator-exclusion | denominator | denominator-exclusion | denominator-exception | measure-population | measure-population-exclusion | measure-observation

target.display: initial-population | numerator | numerator-exclusion | denominator | denominator-exclusion | denominator-exception | measure-population | measure-population-exclusion | measure-observation
target.comment: R5 `Measure.group.population.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.group.population.code`

element.display: The criteria that defines this population

target.display: The criteria that defines this population
target.comment: R5 `Measure.group.population.criteria` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Measure.group.population.criteria` - criteria made the element mandatory; criteria increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; criteria has change due to type change: R5 `criteria` `Expression` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `criteria`

element.display: The human readable description of this population criteria

target.display: The human readable description of this population criteria
target.comment: R5 `Measure.group.population.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.group.population.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B description

R5 `Measure.group.population.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.group.population.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: A group resource that defines this population

target.comment: R5 `Measure.group.population.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.group.population.id`

element.display: Unique id for population in measure
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Measure.group.population.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.group.population.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

R5 `Measure.group.stratifier.component.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.group.stratifier.component.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: E.g. Patient, Practitioner, RelatedPerson, Organization, Location, Device

target.comment: R5 `Measure.guidance` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.guidance`
R5 `Measure.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.id`
R5 `Measure.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Measure.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.implicitRules`

R5 `Measure.improvementNotation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.improvementNotation` - improvementNotation has compatible required binding for non-code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/measure-improvement-notation|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/measure-improvement-notation|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
R5 `Measure.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.jurisdiction`
R5 `Measure.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Measure.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: When the measure was last reviewed by the publisher

target.display: When the measure was last reviewed
target.comment: R5 `Measure.lastReviewDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.lastReviewDate`
R5 `Measure.library` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.library`
R5 `Measure.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.meta`

R5 `Measure.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Measure.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `Measure.name` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.name`

R5 `Measure.purpose` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.purpose`

R5 `Measure.scoring` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.scoring`

R5 `Measure.status` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Measure.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
